Text:
"Ok now for this one we used the R4 for the video
Made a script to resize and sharpen.........
Adjusted the rgb as the colors seemed off 
and made a bit darker as it 
brought the color out better
Audio is from the NeDivx release "

If it's a DVDRip, why fuck with it?
Is this a DVDRip? Lots of video information and comments about it being corrected usually means a crappy camera job
